name: WKExtendedRuntimeSessionDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods for monitoring an extended runtime session.

items.name: func extendedRuntimeSessionDidStart(WKExtendedRuntimeSession)
items.desc: Indicates that the session has started running.

items.name: func extendedRuntimeSessionWillExpire(WKExtendedRuntimeSession)
items.desc: Indicates that the session is about to expire.

items.name: func extendedRuntimeSession(WKExtendedRuntimeSession, didInvalidateWith: WKExtendedRuntimeSessionInvalidationReason, error: Error?)
items.desc: Indicates that the session has encountered an error or stopped running.

items.name: enum WKExtendedRuntimeSessionInvalidationReason
items.desc: The reasons why a session can become invalid.
